thread.title: NOPD: Woman moves out of Algiers home, steals roommate's rent
thread.title_full: NOPD: Woman moves out of Algiers home, steals roommate's rent - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: NOPD: Woman moves out of Algiers home, steals roommate's rent
text:
NEW ORLEANS, LA (WVUE) - The NOPD is asking for the public’s help in locating a woman wanted for a theft in Algiers.
The incident took place Sept. 21 on Sullivan Place.
Police said 26-year-old Jericha Brown, who lived with the victim, was given $1,500 in cash to pay the rent. Instead, they said Brown kept the cash and took a television, Xbox One and a Dell laptop from the victim’s home.
Brown moved out of the victim’s house and has not been seen or heard from since.
Fourth District Detectives are investigating the incident and can be contacted at 658-6040.
Citizens with information that can help solve this crime are asked to call Crimestoppers at 822-1111 or toll-free 1-877-903-STOP. You could receive a cash reward of up to $2,500 for the information leading only to the arrest, except on homicides, where Crimestoppers will pay half of the reward upon the arrest and half on the indictment of the responsible person(s). You do not have to give your name nor testify to receive the reward but you must contact Crimestoppers directly with your information. Citizens can also submit an anonymous tip online to Crimestoppers at www.crimestoppersgno.org
